tasks.label: npm: install, build, and dev
tasks.command: if not exist node_modules (npm install && npm run build) && npm run dev

windows.command: if (-not (Test-Path "node_modules")) { npm install; npm run build }; npm run dev

linux.command: if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install && npm run build; fi && npm run dev

osx.command: if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install && npm run build; fi && npm run dev
